Parser Error Helpers¶

Helper functions for throwing parsing errors when creating a new plugin SType.

xrpl_plugin.stypes.parser_errors.array_expected(arg0: str, arg1: str) → xrpl_plugin.basic_types.JsonValue¶
xrpl_plugin.stypes.parser_errors.bad_type(arg0: str, arg1: str) → xrpl_plugin.basic_types.JsonValue¶
xrpl_plugin.stypes.parser_errors.invalid_data(*args, **kwargs)¶

Overloaded function.

  2. invalid_data(arg0: str, arg1: str) -> xrpl_plugin.rippled_py.basic_types.JsonValue

xrpl_plugin.stypes.parser_errors.make_name(arg0: str, arg1: str) → str¶

Get the name of the object being parsed.
